title: Its been more than 24 hours.
body: Riot please help its been already more than 24 hours since i last replied to my ticket and they wont reply back.

replies.body:
Hey Jasper705,

As godsmustbecrazy3 has mentioned it can take a few days at times to get a complete response back from the team. This normally occurs when we receive a large number of requests over  weekend.

I have however checked your ticket and one of the support guys had already picked your ticket up and were looking at.
All being well your issue will be sorted asap.

-ToxicHawk
Chill out bro. It takes 2 to 3 working days for them to see your ticket. Trust me, they do their best to help you out.
